trans-unit.note: Class = "UIBarButtonItem"; title = "Close"; ObjectID = "ebS-pB-Qan";

trans-unit.source:
It seems that AutoFill did not close correctly the last time.
This can happen with large databases or memory-demanding database settings (Argon2).
Please contact us if you need help with this.
trans-unit.target:
Es scheint, dass AutoFill das letzte Mal nicht korrekt geschlossen hat.
Dies kann mit großen Datenbanken oder speicherintensiven Datenbankeinstellungen (Argon2) passieren.
Bitte kontaktieren Sie uns, wenn Sie Hilfe benötigen.

alt-trans.target:
Es scheint, dass AutoFill das letzte Mal nicht korrekt geschlossen hat.
Dies kann mit großen Datenbanken oder speicheranspruchsvollen Datenbankeinstellungen (Argon2) passieren.
Bitte kontaktieren Sie uns, wenn Sie Hilfe benötigen.

trans-unit.source: Please re-add databases and key files you want to use with the AutoFill feature.
trans-unit.target: Wenn sie die AutoFill-Funktion nutzen wollen fügen die bitte die Datenbank und Schlüsseldatei erneut hinzu.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Please re-add databases and key files you want to use with the AutoFill feature."; ObjectID = "P0M-N3-ynf";

trans-unit.source:
The AutoFill cannot automatically access the files you already have in the main KeePassium app.
Why? Behind the scenes, the system treats AutoFill as a separate app, independent from the main KeePassium process. For security reasons, an app cannot simply access any external files – unless you explicitly link these files to that app. Thus the system guarantees that the app can only access the few files you allowed it to.
As a result, both AutoFill and the main KeePassium app need to be given their own permissions for each external file. Luckily, this is a one-time procedure.
trans-unit.target:
Der AutoFill kann nicht automatisch auf die Dateien zugreifen, die Sie bereits in der Haupt-KeePassium-App haben.
Warum? Hinter den Kulissen behandelt das System AutoFill als separate App, unabhängig vom Hauptprozess von KeePassium. Aus Sicherheitsgründen kann eine App keine externen Dateien abrufen – es sei denn, Sie verknüpfen diese Dateien ausdrücklich mit dieser App. Das System garantiert also, dass die App nur auf die Dateien zugreifen kann, für die Sie die Erlaubnis gegeben haben.
Infolgedessen müssen AutoFill und die Haupt-KeePassium-App ihre eigenen Berechtigungen für jede externe Datei erhalten. Glücklicherweise ist dies nur einmalig gemacht werden.

Default title of a new entry
Action to start editing an entry
Field title
Field title
Field title
Field title
Field title
Title of a field with an error message
Message to confirm deletion of an item.
Notification text when the user tries to close a document with unsaved changes
Title of a notification when the user tries to close a document with unsaved changes
Title of an error message about file export
Title of an error message about file import
Action/button to delete a file (destroys the file forever)
Action/button to remove a file from the app (the file remains, but the app forgets about it)
Title of an error message notification
Title of an error message about iOS system keychain
Title of an warning message
Action/button to cancel whatever is going on
Action/button to write an email to support
Action/button to delete an item (destroys the item/file)
Action/button to discard any unsaved changes
Action/button to close an error message.
Action/button to finish (editing) and keep changes
Action/button to edit an item
Action/button to export an item to another app
Action/button: generic OK
Action/button to rename an item
Action/button to replace an item with another one
Action/button to show additional information about an error or item
Action/button to create a new sub-group in the current group
Title of a form for creating a group
Title of a form for editing a group
Default name of a new group
Name of an entry/group category (visual style): default one, like in KeePass

trans-unit.id: [KeyFile/Delete/Confirm/text] Delete key file? Make sure you have a backup.
trans-unit.source: Delete key file? Make sure you have a backup.
trans-unit.target: Schlüsseldatei löschen? Stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie ein Backup haben.
trans-unit.note: Message to confirm deletion of a key file.
News title for beta testers: the app is now available on the App Store.
Title of an announcement [expiryDateFormatted: String]

trans-unit.id: [News/AutoFill/stubText] Please open the main app for the full announcement.
trans-unit.source: Please open the main app for the full announcement.
trans-unit.target: Bitte öffnen Sie die Haupt-App für die vollständige Ankündigung.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when opening an announcement in AutoFill

trans-unit.source: Preview attached files directly in KeePassium and leave no traces in other apps. (Works with images, documents, archives and more.)
trans-unit.target: Vorschau der angehängten Dateien erfolgt direkt in KeePassium und hinterlässt keine Spuren in anderen Apps. (Funktioniert mit Bildern, Dokumenten, Archiven uvm.)
trans-unit.note: Explanation of the premium feature
Title of a premium feature

trans-unit.source: Tired of typing your master password? Keep your database open longer and unlock it with one tap.
trans-unit.target: Sind sie genervt immer das Materpasswort einzugeben? Halten sie Ihre Datenbank länger auf und entsperren Sie sie mit nur einem Klick.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of the premium feature
Title of a premium feature

trans-unit.source: Keep KeePassium improved, maintained and without ads.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium verbessern, pflegen und ohne Werbung.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of the premium feature
Title of a premium feature

trans-unit.source: Add multiple databases and quickly switch between them.
trans-unit.target: Fügen Sie mehrere Datenbanken hinzu und wechseln Sie schnell zwischen ihnen.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of the premium feature
Title of a premium feature

trans-unit.source: Community support means no obligations. With premium, get answers and solutions directly from the developer.
trans-unit.target: Mit dem Community Support gehen sie keine Verpflichtungen ein. Mit Premium erhalten sie Untersützung direkt vom Entwickler.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of the premium feature

trans-unit.target: Erreichbarer Support, der sich um dich kümmert
trans-unit.note: Title of a premium feature

trans-unit.id: [Premium/Upgrade/Deferred/text] Thank you! You can use KeePassium while purchase is awaiting approval from a parent
trans-unit.source: Thank you! You can use KeePassium while purchase is awaiting approval from a parent
trans-unit.target: Vielen Dank! Du kannst KeePassium verwenden, während auf eine Bestätigung des Kaufs gewartet wird
trans-unit.note: Message shown when in-app purchase is deferred until parental approval.
Status message when downloading available in-app purchases
Status: in-app purchase started

trans-unit.id: [Premium/Upgrade/RestoreFailed/text] No previous purchase could be restored.
trans-unit.source: No previous purchase could be restored.
trans-unit.target: Kein vorheriger Kauf konnte wiederhergestellt werden.
trans-unit.note: Text of an error message: there were no in-app purchases that can be restored
Title of an error message: there were no in-app purchases that can be restored
Text of the message shown after in-app purchase was successfully restored
Title of the message shown after in-app purchase was successfully restored
Text of the message shown after successful in-app purchase
Title of the message shown after a successful in-app purchase
Action/button to start choosing premium versions and possibly buying one
Description of a premium option. Lowercase. For example 'Business Premium / with priority support'.
Product price for monthly premium subscription. [localizedPrice: String]
Product price for annual premium subscription. [localizedPrice: String]
Product price for once-and-forever premium. [localizedPrice: String]

trans-unit.id: [Premium/Upgrade] Hmm, there are no upgrades available. This should not happen, please contact support.
trans-unit.source: Hmm, there are no upgrades available. This should not happen, please contact support.
trans-unit.target: Hmm, es sind keine Upgrades verfügbar. Dies sollte nicht passieren, bitte kontaktieren Sie den Support.
trans-unit.note: Error message: AppStore returned no available in-app purchase options
Status: special premium for beta-testing environment is active
Status: premium subscription has expired. For example: `Expired 1 day ago`. [timeFormatted: String, includes the time unit (day, hour, minute)]
Status: scheduled renewal date of a premium subscription. For example: `Next renewal on 1 Jan 2050`. [expiryDateString: String]
Status: validity period of once-and-forever premium

trans-unit.id: [Premium/usage] App being useful: %@/month, that is around %@/year.
trans-unit.source: App being useful: %1$@/month, that is around %2$@/year.
trans-unit.target: App ist nützlich: %1$@/Monat, das sind etwa %2$@/Jahr.
trans-unit.note: Status: how long the app has been used during some time period. For example: `App being useful: 1hr/month, about 12hr/year`. [monthlyUsage: String, annualUsage: String — already include the time unit (hours, minutes)]

trans-unit.id: [PremiumFeature/BiometricAppLock/description] Quickly access your passwords using Face ID/Touch ID in the premium version.
trans-unit.source: Quickly access your passwords using Face ID/Touch ID in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Zugriff auf Ihre Passwörter mit Hilfe von Face ID/Touch ID in der Premium-Version.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Biometric Unlock` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability to use Touch ID / Face ID in AppLock settings (In Title Case)

trans-unit.id: [PremiumFeature/LongDBTimeouts/description] Save time entering your complex master passwords — keep your database open longer in the premium version.
trans-unit.source: Save time entering your complex master passwords — keep your database open longer in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Sparen Sie Zeit, beim Eingeben komplexer Master-Passwörter — halten Sie Ihre Datenbank länger offen mit der Premium-Version.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Long Database Timeouts` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability to set long delays in Database Lock Timeout settings (In Title Case)

trans-unit.id: [PremiumFeature/MultiDB/description] Easily switch between databases in the premium version.
trans-unit.source: Easily switch between databases in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Wechseln Sie einfach zwischen Datenbanken mit der Premium-Version.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Multiple Databases` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability to use multiple databases (In Title Case)

trans-unit.id: [PremiumFeature/Preview/description] Preview images and documents directly in the app, in the premium version.
trans-unit.source: Preview images and documents directly in the app, in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Vorschau von Bildern und Dokumenten direkt in der App, mit der Premium-Version.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Preview Attachments` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability to preview some attached files directly in the app (In Title Case)
Action/button to make password visible as plain-text
Settings switch: whether AppLock is allowed to use Touch ID/Face ID. Example: 'Use Touch ID'. [biometryTypeName: String]
Settings: subtitle of the `App Protection` section. biometryTypeName will be either 'Touch ID' or 'Face ID'. [biometryTypeName: String]
Settings: subtitle of the `App Protection` section when biometric auth is not available.
Confirmation dialog message to delete all backup files
Action to delete all backup files from the app. `ALL` is in capitals as a highlight. [backupFileCount: Int]
Status message: there are no backup files to delete

trans-unit.id: [Settings/ClearKeyFileAssociations/Cleared/text] Associations between key files and databases have been removed.
trans-unit.source: Associations between key files and databases have been removed.
trans-unit.target: Die Verknüpfungen zwischen Schlüsseldateien und Datenbanken wurden entfernt.
trans-unit.note: Text of the success message for `Clear Key File Associations` button
Title of the success message for `Clear Key File Associations` button

trans-unit.id: [Settings/ClearMasterKeys/Cleared/text] All master keys have been deleted.
trans-unit.source: All master keys have been deleted.
trans-unit.note: Text of the success message for `Clear Master Keys` button
Title of the success message for `Clear Master Keys` button

trans-unit.id: [Settings/ClipboardTimeout/description] When you copy some text from an entry, the app will automatically clear your clipboard (pasteboard) after this time.
trans-unit.source: When you copy some text from an entry, the app will automatically clear your clipboard (pasteboard) after this time.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie etwas kopieren, wird KeePassium Ihre Zwischenablage nach dieser Zeit automatisch löschen.
trans-unit.note: Description of the clipboard/pasteboard timeout.

trans-unit.id: [Settings/DatabaseLockTimeout/description] If you are not interacting with the app for some time, the database will be closed for your safety. To open it, you will need to enter its master password again.
trans-unit.source: If you are not interacting with the app for some time, the database will be closed for your safety. To open it, you will need to enter its master password again.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie länger nicht mit der App interagieren, wird die Datenbank zu Ihrer Sicherheit geschlossen. Um sie zu öffnen, müssen Sie ihr Master-Passwort erneut eingeben.
trans-unit.note: Description of the Database Lock Timeout
Title of a settings section about making backup files
Title of a settings section about file order in lists
Title of a settings section: which entry field to show along with entry title
Title of a settings section: sort order of groups and entries in a list

trans-unit.source: KeePassium stores your passwords, credit cards and other information in an encrypted file (database). You can have multiple databases, for example to separate work, family and personal accounts.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium speichert Ihre Passwörter, Kreditkarten und andere Informationen in einer verschlüsselten Datei (Datenbank). Sie können mehrere Datenbanken nutzen um zum Beispiel Arbeit, Familie und persönliche Konten zu trennen.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "KeePassium stores your passwords, credit cards and other information in an encrypted file (database). \nYou can have multiple databases, for example to separate work, family and personal accounts."; ObjectID = "PgB-6p-H0t";
Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "Add Existing Database"; ObjectID = "ZKW-2f-Xkz";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Beta tester promo"; ObjectID = "Ams-tg-a6W";

trans-unit.source: Install the free version from the App Store, upgrade to premium whenever you want.
trans-unit.target: Installieren Sie die kostenlose Version aus dem App Store, aktualisieren Sie auf Premium, wann immer Sie wollen.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Install the free version from the App Store, upgrade to premium whenever you want."; ObjectID = "DHf-ZF-lUj";

trans-unit.source: Until 31 August 2019, premium upgrades are available at special early bird prices.
trans-unit.target: Bis zum 31. August 2019 sind Premium-Upgrades zu speziellen Frühbuchpreisen erhältlich.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Until 31 August 2019, premium upgrades are available at special early bird prices."; ObjectID = "Dln-R4-hDr";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Early adopter promo"; ObjectID = "Hem-sD-JQZ";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Stick to TestFlight"; ObjectID = "Nha-DI-lcm";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Switch to the free version"; ObjectID = "UVw-Iq-kix";

trans-unit.source: Contact us if you have any questions about switching from beta to release version.
trans-unit.target: Kontaktieren Sie uns, wenn Sie Fragen haben zum Wechsel von Beta zu finalen Version haben.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Contact us if you have any questions about switching from beta to release version."; ObjectID = "WYR-9D-CUb";

trans-unit.source: Tap here to get free premium until 1 Sep 2020. (But note: the early-bird pricing won't be there anymore, so this might not be the best choice in the long run.)
trans-unit.target: Tippe hier, um bis zum 1. Sep 2020 kostenlose Prämie zu erhalten. (Aber beachten Sie: Die Frühbucherpreise werden nicht mehr verfügbar sein, so dass dies langfristig nicht die beste Wahl sein könnte.)
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Tap here to get free premium until 1 Sep 2020. \n(But note: the early-bird pricing won't be there anymore, so this might not be the best choice in the long run.)"; ObjectID = "gBU-27-3it";
Class = "UINavigationItem"; title = "Beta → Release"; ObjectID = "hx0-nf-Kwn";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Contact us"; ObjectID = "lju-i3-mMS";

trans-unit.source: Feel free to stay on the beta channel and get new features as soon as they appear. Beta versions will have all the bells and whistles, but might be less stable than before.
trans-unit.target: Wenn sie möchten können sie auf dem Beta-Kanal zu bleiben und neue Funktionen zu erhalten, sobald sie erscheinen. Beta-Versionen werden alle Funktionen haben, aber möglicherweise weniger stabil sein.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Feel free to stay on the beta channel and get new features as soon as they appear. Beta versions will have all the bells and whistles, but might be less stable than before."; ObjectID = "naw-As-2di";

trans-unit.source: KeePassium is now officially available on the App Store. Thank you for testing!
trans-unit.target: KeePassium ist jetzt offiziell im App Store verfügbar. Vielen Dank für das Testen!
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "KeePassium is now officially available on the App Store. Thank you for testing!"; ObjectID = "xEf-mF-cRj";
Class = "UITableViewSection"; headerTitle = "What's next?"; ObjectID = "yZc-RG-QZj";
Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "Privacy Policy"; ObjectID = "Dfd-LU-ij4";

trans-unit.source:
Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase.
Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase.
trans-unit.target: Der Kaufpreis wird bei der Kaufbestätigung über Ihr Apple ID-Konto abgerechnet. Das Abonnement verlängert sich automatisch, wenn es nicht mindestens 24 Stunden vor Ablauf der aktuellen Laufzeit gekündigt wird. Die Verlängerungsgebühr wird innerhalb von 24 Stunden vor Ablauf der aktuellen Laufzeit über Ihr Konto abgerechnet. Sie können Ihre Abonnements verwalten und kündigen, indem Sie nach dem Kauf Ihre Kontoeinstellungen im App Store aufrufen.

trans-unit.note: Class = "UINavigationItem"; title = "Premium"; ObjectID = "WdG-3q-lNo";
Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "Terms and Conditions"; ObjectID = "ujr-9f-eco";
Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "Restore Purchases"; ObjectID = "yss-Xu-2XK";

trans-unit.source: If you enter a wrong AppLock passcode, KeePassium will close all databases and clear all master keys from the keychain.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie einen falschen AppLock-Passcode eingeben, wird KeePassium alle Datenbanken schließen und alle Master-Schlüssel aus der Schlüsselbund löschen.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "If you enter a wrong AppLock passcode, KeePassium will close all databases and clear all master keys from the keychain."; ObjectID = "5Dg-KX-m7a"; Note = "AppLock settings section: what to do when the user enters a wrong AppLock passcode.";
Class = "UITableViewSection"; headerTitle = "Wrong Passcode"; ObjectID = "5Dg-KX-m7a"; Note = "AppLock settings section: what to do when the user enters a wrong AppLock passcode.";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Protect Databases"; ObjectID = "6Pk-35-Fx6";

trans-unit.source: Allows biometric authentication as a quick (but less secure) alternative to AppLock passcode.
trans-unit.target: Ermöglicht biometrische Authentifizierung als schnelle (aber weniger sichere) Alternative zum AppLock-Passwort.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Allows biometric authentication as a quick (but less secure) alternative to AppLock passcode."; ObjectID = "7ae-8I-LiQ"; Note = "AppLock settings section: biometric auth (Touch ID/Face ID)";

Class = "UITableViewController"; title = "App Protection"; ObjectID = "U5m-je-MhO";

trans-unit.target: Schützen Sie KeePassium vor unbefugten Zugriffen.

trans-unit.source: The app will automatically lock up after this time.
trans-unit.target: Die App wird nach dieser Zeit automatisch gesperrt.

trans-unit.source: When AutoFill inserts the username and password, it can also copy the one-time password (OTP) for you.
trans-unit.target: Wenn AutoFill den Benutzernamen und das Passwort einfügt, kann es auch das einmalige Passwort (OTP) für Sie kopieren.

Class = "UILabel"; text = "Copy OTP to clipboard"; ObjectID = "go1-Nt-isQ"; Note = "Title of an option: copy one-time password to clipboard when using AutoFill";

Class = "UITableViewController"; title = "Keep Backup Files"; ObjectID = "atf-ra-KMC"; Note = "Dialog for selecting the duration of keeping the backup copies.";

trans-unit.source: KeePassium can automatically delete old backup files to free up some storage space.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium kann automatisch alte Sicherungsdateien löschen, um Speicherplatz zu freigeben.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "KeePassium can automatically delete old backup files to free up some storage space."; ObjectID = "B3L-Dk-Uq3"; Note = "Settings section of the `Keep Backup Files` option";
Class = "UITableViewSection"; headerTitle = "Periodic cleanup"; ObjectID = "B3L-Dk-Uq3"; Note = "Settings section of the `Keep Backup Files` option";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Make Backup Copies"; ObjectID = "BJ7-eQ-JOc"; Note = "Settings option: backup databases before saving them";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Keep Backup Files"; ObjectID = "G42-gR-eKm"; Note = "Settings option: how long to keep backup copies. Example: `Keep Backup Copies: 3 days`";

trans-unit.source: Backup copies will appear along with the original files.
trans-unit.target: Sicherungskopien werden zusammen mit den Originaldateien angezeigt.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Backup copies will appear along with the original files."; ObjectID = "XeH-7q-aad"; Note = "Explanation for the `Show Backup Files` option";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Show Backup Files"; ObjectID = "aEK-cJ-9bc"; Note = "Settings option: whether to show backup copies in the list of database files";

trans-unit.source: Before saving a database, KeePassium will automatically make a copy, just in case.
trans-unit.target: Bevor Sie eine Datenbank speichern, wird KeePassium automatisch eine Kopie erstellen; nur zur Sicherheit.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Before saving a database, KeePassium will automatically make a copy, just in case."; ObjectID = "nBI-OF-9iV"; Note = "Explanation for the `Make Backup Copies` option";
Class = "UITableViewController"; title = "Database Backup"; ObjectID = "nSy-3u-0xW";
Class = "UITableViewController"; title = "Clipboard Timeout"; ObjectID = "iJJ-jv-hhP"; Note = "TItle of a list of options, when to delete clipboard content. Alternative title \"Clear Clipboard\"";
Class = "UITableViewController"; title = "Database Timeout"; ObjectID = "26a-m8-zQP"; Note = "Title of a list of database timeouts, linked to Settings/Data Protection/Database Timeout.";
Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "Clear Key File Associations"; ObjectID = "3uV-Zs-RRo";

trans-unit.source:
Once you unlock a database, its master key can be stored in device's secure keychain. The next time, KeePassium will use that key so you won't have to type your full master password again.
(Master keys are automatically cleared on database timeout.)
trans-unit.target:
Sobald Sie eine Datenbank entsperren, kann der Master-Schlüssel im sicheren Schlüsselbund des Gerätes gespeichert werden. Das nächste Mal wird KeePassium diesen Schlüssel verwenden, damit Sie Ihr volles Master-Passwort nicht erneut eingeben müssen.
(Master-Schlüssel werden automatisch auf der Datenbank-Zeitüberschreitung gelöscht.)
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Once you unlock a database, its master key can be stored in device's secure keychain. The next time, KeePassium will use that key so you won't have to type your full master password again. \n\n(Master keys are automatically cleared on database timeout.)"; ObjectID = "Faj-km-pM5";
Class = "UITableViewSection"; headerTitle = "Quick Unlock"; ObjectID = "Faj-km-pM5";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Remember Master Keys"; ObjectID = "INJ-Cy-Tfo";
Class = "UITableViewController"; title = "Data Protection"; ObjectID = "IZZ-aM-g2i";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Remember Key Files"; ObjectID = "JHl-o7-xHI";

trans-unit.source: Remember and automatically select the last used key file for each database. Clearing the associations does not affect the files.
trans-unit.target: Automatisch die zuletzt verwendete Schlüsseldatei für jede Datenbank eintragen. Das Löschen des Eintrags löscht die Dateien nicht.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Remember and automatically select the last used key file for each database. Clearing the associations does not affect the files."; ObjectID = "Mxu-GP-FmN";
Class = "UITableViewSection"; headerTitle = "Key Files"; ObjectID = "Mxu-GP-FmN";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Clipboard Timeout"; ObjectID = "SSu-Sr-MCg";
Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "Clear Master Keys"; ObjectID = "e1v-nv-Mst";

trans-unit.source: When you copy anything, KeePassium will automatically clear your clipboard (pasteboard) after some time.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie etwas kopieren, wird KeePassium Ihre Zwischenablage nach einiger Zeit automatisch löschen.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "When you copy anything, KeePassium will automatically clear your clipboard (pasteboard) after some time."; ObjectID = "hnI-Q8-Ixm";
Class = "UITableViewSection"; headerTitle = "Clipboard"; ObjectID = "hnI-Q8-Ixm";

trans-unit.source: Database timeout closes any opened databases and clears any remembered master keys after some time.
trans-unit.target: Schließt alle Datenbanken und entfernt alle Schlüssel nach der festgelegten Zeit
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Database timeout closes any opened databases and clears any remembered master keys after some time."; ObjectID = "neJ-eG-TV7";

trans-unit.source: After opening a database, automatically show the search field.
trans-unit.target: Nach dem Öffnen einer Datenbank wird automatisch das Suchfeld angezeigt.
